quotes.quote: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
Encourage, lift and strengthen one another. For the positive energy spread to one will be felt by us all. For we are connected, one and all.
If you want to support others you have to stay upright yourself.
It is an eternal obligation toward the human being not to let him suffer from hunger when one has a chance of coming to his assistance.
He stands erect by bending over the fallen. He rises by lifting others.
It is a kingly act to assist the fallen.
Never reach out your hand unless you're willing to extend an arm.
To keep a lamp burning we have to keep putting oil in it.
Life's most urgent questions is: 'What are you doing for others?'
When a person is down in the world, an ounce of help is better than a pound of preaching.
The truest help we can render an afflicted man is not to take his burden from him, but to call out his best energy, that he may be able to bear the burden.
If you have much, give of your wealth; if you have little, give of your heart.
Support the strong, give courage to the timid, remind the indifferent, and warn the opposed.
Help others achieve their dreams and you will achieve yours.
Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
Sometimes the only thing you could do for people was to be there.
Helping others isn't a chore; it is one of the greatest gifts there is.
To give aid to every poor man is far beyond the reach and power of every man. Care of the poor is incumbent on society as a whole.
To aid life, leaving it free, however, that is the basic task of the educator.
Helping people getting a great start in life, a great foundation, is an investment.
Give, but give until it hurts.
No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
Look up and not down. Look forward and not back. Look out and not in, and lend a hand.
Never look down on anybody unless you helping him up.
When you cease to make a contribution, you begin to die.
Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.

Everybody can be great...because anybody can serve. You don't have to have a college degree to serve. You don't have to make your subject and verb agree to serve. You only need a heart full of grace. A soul generated by love.
You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.
I am only one, but still I am one. I cannot do everything, but still I can do something; and because I cannot do everything, I will not refuse to do something I can do.
The greatest good you can do for another is not just share your riches, but reveal to them their own.
